nodes.text: Halaib Aweti was a male Human living in the town of Raider's Cove on the planet of Rishi during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
Halaib Aweti appears as the armstech trainer in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan, released on December 2, 2014 as an expansion the the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
